title: 13-day Cruise on Norwegian Spirit

itinerary.details: Sydney’s harbour is the vibrant heart of the city, offering iconic sights like the Opera House and Harbour Bridge, scenic beaches like Bondi and Coogee, and the charming Rocks district for shopping and art
Eden, a coastal gem in New South Wales, is a natural paradise of beaches, national parks, and oyster farms, offering endless outdoor adventures by land and sea
Burnie, on Tasmania’s northwest coast, is a creative hub known for its artisan crafts, local produce, and wildlife, where nature and culture meet by the beach
Melbourne, once a gold rush city, is Australia’s cultural hub with art, wildlife experiences, scenic train rides, and the historic Chinatown
Melbourne, once a gold rush city, is Australia’s cultural hub with art, wildlife experiences, scenic train rides, and the historic Chinatown
Melbourne, once a gold rush city, is Australia’s cultural hub with art, wildlife experiences, scenic train rides, and the historic Chinatown
Doubtful Sound, New Zealand’s deepest fjord, is a misty, rain-soaked wonderland of towering waterfalls, lush rainforest, diverse wildlife, and rare black coral
Dunedin, a historic South Island town, is home to wildlife, Victorian architecture, a castle, and local crafts.
LytJust 20 minutes from the centre of Christchurch city,telton, a historic port town near Christchurch, is a vibrant hub of artists, cafés, and unique shops
Wellington blends Victorian charm, stunning harbour views, beaches, and LOTR filming sites with great shopping for crafts and local goods
Napier, the Art Deco capital, offers beautifully preserved architecture, scenic Marine Parade, and renowned vineyards for wine lovers

Explore Tauranga’s beaches, parks, and rich history, including a village frozen by volcanic eruption. Don’t miss Hell’s Gate geothermal park with its boiling pools, geysers, and the famous Poutamu mud bath.
Return & disembark

whatsIncluded: Full board available in buffet and main restaurant

Enjoy breathtaking ocean views as we head north.
Discover the 'Salmon Capital of the World

Step back in time to the Klike Gold Rush era

title: 7-Night Mediterranean: Italy, Croatia & Greece NCL

itinerary.details: Board the ship in Rome and get settled. Explore the ship’s amenities or enjoy the evening in the port city.
Discover the Amalfi Coast and enjoy scenic views. You can visit historic Salerno, stroll through its medieval streets, or relax by the waterfront.
Explore Catania’s vibrant markets, Baroque architecture, and the stunning views of Mount Etna.
Visit Corfu’s Old Town, a UNESCO World Heritage site, or relax on its beautiful beaches.
Explore the medieval town of Kotor, its city walls, and the scenic bay.
Visit Diocletian’s Palace, wander through the old town, or enjoy the Adriatic coastline.
Discover the charming port town of Koper, its historic square, and nearby Venetian architecture.
Arrive in Venice. Enjoy the canals, St. Mark’s Square, and the historic city of Ravenna.

amenities: world-class spa on board Norwegian Gem

knowBeforeYouGo: Check your specific sailing for exact departure and arrival times
All times are local to the port
Itineraries are subject to change at any time without notice
all guests must be on board 2 hours before sailing on Day 1 of cruise
Disembarkation usually begins 2 hours after docking on final day of cruise.

title: 6-Day Western Caribbean from Tampa, FL

itinerary.details: Set sail from Tampa’s Gulf Coast for an exciting cruise adventure filled with culture and fun. Explore Ybor City’s Cuban charm, visit the Salvador Dalí Museum, or relax on the beautiful beaches of St. Pete and Clearwater.
No port today! It’s a great time to explore your ship and its exciting entertainment, food and activities! Or take it easy at the pool, spa, or... if you book a room with a balcony, enjoy the waves

Cozumel is proof that Mexico can do ‘island flavor’ with the best of the Caribbean. It may not be the biggest island in the sea, but Cozumel offers a huge variety of things to do, see, taste and explore. This island just happens to be perched atop a coral reef, which promises hours of snorkeling or scuba diving fun.

A cruise to Belize offers the perfect mix of adventure and paradise — from lush rainforests and ancient Mayan ruins to vibrant coral reefs. Explore underground caves, snorkel the world’s second-largest barrier reef, and unwind on silky tropical beaches surrounded by natural beauty.

Cruise to Costa Maya and experience Mexico’s Caribbean charm with turquoise waters, white-sand beaches, and ancient Mayan ruins. Explore the Chacchoben temples, dive into the Great Mesoamerican Reef, or relax by the stunning Lake of Seven Colors for the perfect tropical escape

Fun Day at Sea", details: "No port today! It’s a great time to explore your ship and its exciting entertainment, food and activities! Or take it easy at the pool, spa, or... if you book a room with a balcony, enjoy the waves
Return to Tampa and explore Ybor City, local museums, or relax on nearby beaches before heading home.

whatsIncluded: Dining in main restaurants and Lido Marketplace

Respect local customs by dressing modestly at temples. Enjoy friendly market haggling while shopping — just remember to bargain with a smile. Keep your camera close to capture unforgettable moments as you explore onshore.

Don't underestimate the size of Bali. While destinations like Kuta and Ubud appear to be close to Benoa, unpredictable driving conditions mean it's best to stay relatively closeby. Be careful when converting local currency amounts. Think of each 10,000 rupiah note as a $1 bill (even though it's slightly less valuable) to avoid getting confused by large denominations

Locals tend to dress conservatively outside of beach villages. A sarong can easily double as a beach blanket and cover-up when needed.Many of the best food stands and souvenir merchants don't take credit cards, so have cash on hand.It's polite to greet people with your right hand.
